direction.raw_text: I don't think you do love me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?

direction.raw_text: I mean we love each other as friends. But... Kevin, you were sitting on all these incredible feelings... all tied up in that box with my pictures in desperate need of a love affair. And me... well, I needed to break the Alec habit... and it's only natural I would turn to you in my confusion. But this doesn't feel real. It feels manufactured.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's me, isn't it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you kidding? You're a little a miracle. (CONTINUED)

direction.raw_text: But not a big miracle like Alec.

direction.raw_text: Oh, Alec was the big miracle for a long time... But I think I'd like to try life without any miracles for a while. Kevin realizes how serious Leslie is.

direction.raw_text: Well, having your first byline, and losing the love of your life in the same night has a certain 'The Gods must be laughing at me' feeling.

direction.raw_text: I'm not the love of your life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who says?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I say.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But you're a girl, what do you know? Leslie embraces him with deep friendship.

direction.raw_text: .O.) I realized what a terrific person she was and how much fun it was knowing her and I thought of that old joke, you know, this guy goes to a psychiatrist and says, 'Doc, uh, my brother's crazy. He thinks he's a chicken,' and the doctor says, 'Well, why don't you turn
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: him in?' And the guy says, 'I would, but I need the eggs.' Well, I guess that's pretty much how I feel about relationships. (MORE) (CONTINUED)

direction.raw_text: WOODY (V.O.) R You know they're totally irrational and crazy and absurd and... but .1 guess we keep going through it because, uh, most of us need the eggs.

direction.raw_text: I don't think I need the eggs anymore. Dale Biberman gave me enough cholesterol for a lifetime. You were right all along... Love stinks.

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ST. ELMO'S - NIGHT 155 KI RBO I always thought we'd be friends forever.

direction.raw_text: . LARGE GLAMOROUS INTERNATIONAL BANKING OFFICES - DAY 156 A well-dressed female executive secretary looks disturbed as she enters a formidable office. She returns with a distinguished GENTLEMAN in a grey suit. He approaches Leslie who is waiting anxiously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, may I help you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want to see Forrester Davidson Jr.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am Forrester Davidson Jr. Leslie is shocked and even more confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, there must be some mistake. I've come to see Julianna van Patten and they told me she doesn't work here anymore.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SENATOR HODGES' HEADQUARTERS - AFTERNOON (NOVEMBER) 157 Busy. Active. Alec is on a phone and talking to co- workers at the same time. He looks up to see Leslie, very shaken, waiting across the room. He is immediately angered, but eventually gets off the phone and joins her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you forget one of your albums?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry to bother you here. It's Jules. After she left for work this morning, the finance company came and took away all her furniture, her Jeep, everything they could get their hands on... I couldn't reach her so I finally went over to her office. Alec -- she was fired three weeks ago! All this time, she's been pretending to go to work every day , and pretending to be still having this affair with her boss. And she's been doing a lot of coke .. Well, anyway, I confronted her at the apartment, and at first she denied everything, but then she went crazy -- and now she's locked herself in the apartment and she won't let me back in... I'm really worried about her. Alec hesitates angrily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alec, please. I need your help.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (0.S.) She's in there. (CONTINUED)

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) a Jules, come on. Just open the door.

direction.raw_text: . JULES' APARTMENT 160 The main room is empty and dark, except for Jules, who sits on the floor dressed only in a thin T-shirt and bikini pants. Thin, tired, no makeup, this is a differ- ent Jules than we have seen before. Freezing winds shoot through the open window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . APARTMENT HALLWAY 161 ALEC Jules, remember my junior year when I went cold turkey on cigarettes? You sat up with me all night in the commons room feeding me emergency carrots...? No answer.

direction.raw_text: The fire escape!

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . HALLWAY 165 Leslie pounds on the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jules, you're really scaring me now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . JULES' FIRE ESCAPE - LATE AFTERNOON 166 Alec, Kevin and Kirbo cannot budge the bars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The whole country is.falling apart, but these five bars are made perfectly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We need something that cuts through metal.

direction.raw_text: I'll find Billy. Kirbo dashes down the fire escape.

direction.raw_text: I was kidding. (CONTINUED)

direction.raw_text: I saw your article.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, well, yesterday's editorial achievement is today's garbage wrapper, right...? Kevin tries to laugh charmingly. Alec tries to laugh along with him, but suddenly rage returns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You little shit!!! He grabs Kevin. Kevin tries to fight back, but Alec is so overpowering he pushes Kevin up to the railing of the fire escape, and then pushes him over. Kevin hangs upside down as Alec holds him by his legs. Dozens of scraps of paper fall from his pocket. Leaning out the apartment hallway window, Leslie sees them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alec, no!!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . JULES' HALLWAY - LATE AFTERNOON 167 Leslie runs screaming through the hall and down the stairs, passing Ron Dellassandro who is just coming home from work.

direction.raw_text: What's happening???
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . JULES' FIRE ESCAPE - LATE AFTERNOON 168 Kevin, still hanging upside down, tries to hang on to Alec. Papers continue to fly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My notes!

direction.raw_text: You won't need any more notes on the meaning of life.

direction.raw_text: (upside-down,

direction.raw_text: Alec, stop Iit! She frantically starts climbing the fire escape.

direction.raw_text: Alec!!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: After all I've done for you.

direction.raw_text: You think this is helping Jules? With Kevin's life still in his hands, he suddenly remembers Jules.

direction.raw_text: Oh, my God. Jules, please, it's so cold.

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bullshit.

direction.raw_text: I have never lied to you once since the day I met you... you cocky shithead. (CONTINUED)

direction.raw_text: Hang on, Jules. We all love you. She has been holding onto the bars with her bare-hands, but the bitter cold makes her wince as she removes her hands. Alec is overwhelmed with feelings as he takes her hands and holds them to his mouth, breathing warm breath onto them. Much emotion passes between them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your breath, your breath is so sweet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Leslie, I'm sorry. I'm so profoundly sorry. Kirbo and Kevin arrive. Billy races down the alley.

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do not hand him a blowtorch! Kevin takes the torch and goes for the bars. SPARKS and fire fly. Suddenly there is a PHENOMENAL POUNDING from inside the apartment at Jules' front door. It stops everyone on the fire escape.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . JULES' APARTMENT 171 The POUNDING jolts Jules.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . JULES' HALLWAY - LATE AFTERNOON 172 Billy pounds on the door as Ron watches nervously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jules, it's Billy. Open the door. (NO REPLY) Okay, Jules... Open up the goddamn door, or I'm coming right through it. No reply. Billy spots a large metal fire extinguisher at the end of the hall.

direction.raw_text: You want some coffee, Ron? Ron enters tentatively and joins them as JULES and BILLY start SHOUTING and LAUGHING LOUDER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, until today I thought gay people were nuts.
direction.name: direction

direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: REVEALS it's Wendy's apartment. It is partially painted and a large ladder stands in the room. A small. wing chair has fabric swatches on it. Cartons, books, etc. Wendy sits on the floor watching Billy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then what happened?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was it... We came out of the bedroom and had coffee with everybody.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You saved her life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's not get dramatic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, when did you get so sane?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When I realized how insane I've been all this time tryin' to be like Alec and Leslie... and you and Kevin... I'm not part of this post-college Georgetown life; marriage and jobs. Felicia and Melody'll be better off without me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did she get remarried already?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three or four weeks... (MORE) (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was thinkin' of hanging around tryin'to be one of those in-the- neighborhood dads... but it would just confuse everybody... especially me. New York'll suit me fine. if somebody'll let me play sax. (INDICATING APARTMENT) This is great.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll tell you what's great. Last night I woke up in the middle of the night and made myself a peanut butter and jelly sandwich... and you know it was my kitchen, and my refrigerator and My apartment . and it was the best peanut butter and jelly sandwich I've ever had in my life. They chuckle together and then they become more serious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So you're goin', huh...? She picks up his sax and blows a few comic notes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, are you still a virgin?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why is my sexual status so important to you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have I abused our relationship too much? Or could I be so bold... as to ask you for a going-away present...? Wendy is moved.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lying on the floor of her bedroom. Only a candle lights the room. Billy's face comes INTO FRAME and they kiss, tenderly at first and then more passionately. Wendy looks beautiful and she and Billy are filled with a tenderness and love that can only exist from the years they have shared together. The SAX BUILDS as the wonder of the two young lovers builds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BUS TERMINAL - NIGHT 181 A large bus pulls out as Leslie stands at a coffee vending machine. Alec approaches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Need someone to blow on your hands? She smiles, but shows him her gloves. As she searches for change in her pockets, Alec stops her and puts his own coins in the machine. He presses buttons as he talks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you know that I.always wanted to make you coffee? I tried once
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: when you were in the shower -- but it didn't turn out right, so I threw it out and cleaned everything up so you wouldn't know. I don't like doing things I'm not good at
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: like making coffee and saying I'm sorry... He looks at her sincerely as he hands her the plastic cup from the machine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leslie, I'm sorry. They exchange a tender glance, and then Leslie takes a sip from the steaming cup.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alec, this is soup.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is soup. Alec's nervousness turns to embarrassment as they both start to laugh. Old feelings surge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I love you. They look at each other for a moment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We need time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know. (CONTINUED)
